Online Corpus

Online Corpus is a company that helps you mitigate man in the middle and business email compromise attacks, spear phishing and whaling. We deliver cyber security trainings and cyber protection software that keeps cyber criminals away from you. The point of our website and blog is to provide you with enough knowledge, so that you will be informed about latest trends in the cyber crime world, and teach you how to stay safe.

Have you checked out our Chrome web extension? It's free and it contains everyhing you need to stay secure when browsing your email via a browser.
